Title: The Van Buren Boys
Plot: Jerry's girlfriend, Ellen, seems perfect in every way, but everyone else seems to have a problem with her. George interviews candidates for the Foundation's first scholarship. The candidates seem over-qualified, until one comes in who is a lot like he was. Elaine is going to ghost write Peterman's biography. Kramer goes to Lorenzo's pizza, where he has an encounter with the Van Buren boys. He accidentally flashes their gang sign and saves himself. Peterman wants his day to day life covered in hi
GuestStars: Barney Martin, Liz Sheridan, John O'Hurley, David Moscow, Bruce Davison, Christine Taylor, Jed Rhein, Tony Colitti, Yunoka Doyle, Dublin James, Justine Slater, Michelle Maika, Steve Hofvendahl
